      • getXReflected

        public Level getXReflected()
        Flip the level on the x axis. Using this method and getTransposed(), one can produce levels with a door facing out from all four sides if a door exists.
        Specified by:
        getXReflected in interface Editable

      • fillDoor

        public void fillDoor(Vector pos,
                     Tile fill,
                     Tile.TileType floor)
        For use in world generation. Fill in a door in a dungeon.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the door
        floor - The background tile type (used for orientation)
